channel.title: Other Libraries :: CIS 526 Textbook
channel.description: Other Useful Libraries Before we move on, letâ€™s install a few other useful libraries that perform various tasks in our Express application. Compression The compression middleware library does exactly what it says it will - it compresses any responses generated by the server and sent through the network. This can be helpful in many situations, but not all. Recall that compression is really just trading more processing time in exchange for less network bandwidth, so we may need to consider which of those we are more concerned about. Thankfully, adding or removing the compression middleware library is simple.
